thread.title: Canada won't underrate depleted Ghana squad in tonight's friendly
thread.title_full: Canada won't underrate depleted Ghana squad in tonight's friendly

title: Canada won't underrate depleted Ghana squad in tonight's friendly
text:
15:10 CET Canada won't underrate depleted Ghana squad in tonight's friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Canada assistant coach Michael Findley says they wonâ€™t underrate the injury-hit Ghana team when they face the Black Stars in an international friendly in Washington tonight. 
Ghana coach Avram Grant is missing several players because of injuries and visa problems which have led to the exclusion of several key players. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
